General.Name: Xiamen Xiangyu Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Xiangyu Co., Ltd. provides supply chain services in the People's Republic of China. The company's supply chain service systems for commodities such as agricultural products, energy, chemicals, metals, and minerals. It also offers integrated procurement and distribution services comprising international procurement and freight consolidation, international delivery, international re-export logistics, supplier inventory management, bonded day tour, and manuals management services; and international multimodal transport services, such as door-to-door sea-land, sea-air, and land-air transport, as well as warehousing, declaration, and storage. In addition, the company provides domestic door to door delivery services; and financial logistics services, including pledge and confirmed financing services. Further, it develops, constructs, and operates logistics platforms. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.
